backend/main.mo: Defines catalog data types and returns a static multi‑category laundry catalog via getCatalog().
backend/migration.mo: Contains a no‑op migration that returns the provided state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a price‑update requirement to specific frontend files and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering CatalogPage inside a full-height container.
frontend/src/components/BrandedHeader.ts: Renders a header with logo, title, subtitle, and a faint background image.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Tab component for switching catalog categories using shadcn/ui Tabs.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalog-pr: Regression test placeholder for verifying catalog price rendering at a specific XPath.
frontend/src/features/catalog/CatalogPag: Main catalog UI with category selection, search, loading/error states, and item display.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: React Query hook fetching the latest catalog from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state and provides login and identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, plugins, typography, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature state, requests, and project settings.
